summary: This bill, the 'Choosing Our Own Lives Over Fast Firearms Act' (COOL OFF Act), aims to establish a 3-day waiting period for handgun purchases, with specific exceptions. It amends existing federal law (18 U.S. Code § 922) to mandate the waiting period for transfers between private citizens and for transfers by licensed firearms dealers. Exemptions include transfers to law enforcement, certain family members, and in situations of imminent threat. Penalties for violations are specified, and the changes become effective 90 days after enactment.
